snippet: Disguised in coalition military uniforms, the Taliban fighters  started a two-hour gun battle that killed nine insurgents, four Afghan guards and at least four civilians.
abstract: Taliban fighters, disguised in coalition military uniforms, attack large coalition airfield in eastern Afghanistan, detonating three car bombs and engaging in two-hour gun battle that kills nine insurgents, four Afghan guards and at least four civilians.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and MATTHEW ROSENBERG

lead_paragraph: Disguised in coalition military uniforms, the Taliban fighters  started a two-hour gun battle that killed nine insurgents, four Afghan guards and at least four civilians.

headline.main: Attackers at U.S.-Afghan Base Wore Coalition Uniforms
headline.print_headline: Attackers at U.S.-Afghan Base Wore Coalition Uniforms
